Layer.InitCommand: %function(self) k = scoreIndex scoreIndex = k + 1 table.insert(scoreRow,self) self:y(scoreRowY*(table.getn(scoreRow)-1)) if AllScores[k] then self:playcommand('Set') else self:zoom(0) end end
